trans-unit.source: Sorry, we couldn't find any supported font data in this file.
trans-unit.target: Sorry, we couldn't find any supported font data in this file.

trans-unit.source: Requires application restart to take effect.
trans-unit.target: Requires application restart to take effect.

trans-unit.source: Search character name or unicode hex
trans-unit.target: Search character name or unicode hex

trans-unit.source: This app is designed to replace the Windows Win32 Character Map. It is more DPI aware on high DPI screens.
trans-unit.target: This app is designed to replace the Windows Win32 Character Map. It is more DPI aware on high DPI screens.

trans-unit.source: Existing font pending delete. Please restart app.
trans-unit.target: Existing font pending delete. Please restart app.

trans-unit.source: Some fonts could not be completely removed right now. These fonts will not show in the application and will be completely removed next time the app is launched.
trans-unit.target: Some fonts could not be completely removed right now. These fonts will not show in the application and will be completely removed next time the app is launched.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, something went wrong whilst we were trying to save the image.
trans-unit.target: Sorry, something went wrong whilst we were trying to save the image.

trans-unit.source: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

trans-unit.source: Drag fonts into the app to copy them to your library.
trans-unit.target: Drag fonts into the app to copy them to your library.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this collection?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to delete this collection?

trans-unit.source: Show Font names using System default font
trans-unit.target: Show Font names using System default font

trans-unit.source: Show Font names using actual font
trans-unit.target: Show Font names using actual font

trans-unit.source: {0} files were added to your collection
trans-unit.target: {0} files were added to your collection

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this font from your library?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to delete this font from your library?

trans-unit.source: Copy error to Clipboard and open GitHub
trans-unit.target: Copy error to Clipboard and open GitHub

trans-unit.source: To help us debug and fix this for you, please consider opening an issue on our GitHub page and posting the details. We'll try and fix it right away!
trans-unit.target: To help us debug and fix this for you, please consider opening an issue on our GitHub page and posting the details. We'll try and fix it right away!

trans-unit.source: Toggle instant search. If disabled, you can start a search by using the enter key or pressing the search icon.
trans-unit.target: Toggle instant search. If disabled, you can start a search by using the enter key or pressing the search icon.

trans-unit.source: The size of individual characters inside the character grid. Smaller sizes may affect performance.
trans-unit.target: The size of individual characters inside the character grid. Smaller sizes may affect performance.

trans-unit.source: Show the tools for XAML developers, like Symbol Icon and Font Icon.
trans-unit.target: Show the tools for XAML developers, like Symbol Icon and Font Icon.

trans-unit.source: Choose the dev language for developer features content.
trans-unit.target: Choose the dev language for developer features content.

trans-unit.source: Animates the character grid when resizing the window. Turning this on can incur a large performance penalty when resizing the window.
trans-unit.target: Animates the character grid when resizing the window. Turning this on can incur a large performance penalty when resizing the window.

trans-unit.source: Choose the font used to display the names of fonts in the font list.
trans-unit.target: Choose the font used to display the names of fonts in the font list.

trans-unit.source: Override the in-app language. Requires a restart to take effect.
trans-unit.target: Override the in-app language. Requires a restart to take effect.

trans-unit.source: The size in pixels of exported PNG images.
trans-unit.target: The size in pixels of exported PNG images.

trans-unit.source: Enables subtle depth shadows on the UI. Only noticeable when using the Light theme. Turning this on may have a small performance impact on weaker devices. Requires a restart to take effect.
trans-unit.target: Enables subtle depth shadows on the UI. Only noticeable when using the Light theme. Turning this on may have a small performance impact on weaker devices. Requires a restart to take effect.

trans-unit.source: Controls the animation for loading the font list, switching fonts and changing characters. Turning this on has negligible performance impact.
trans-unit.target: Controls the animation for loading the font list, switching fonts and changing characters. Turning this on has negligible performance impact.

trans-unit.source: Shows the Unicode value of a character underneath the character in the character grid. Turning this on can have a minor impact on scrolling performance.
trans-unit.target: Shows the Unicode value of a character underneath the character in the character grid. Turning this on can have a minor impact on scrolling performance.

trans-unit.source: Show Unicode value in Character Grid
trans-unit.target: Show Unicode value in Character Grid

trans-unit.source: Up to 50 pages can be printed at a time. Select the range of pages to print here.
trans-unit.target: Up to 50 pages can be printed at a time. Select the range of pages to print here.

trans-unit.source: This page is outside the current page range and will not be printed. You can change the page range in the Page Setup section.
trans-unit.target: This page is outside the current page range and will not be printed. You can change the page range in the Page Setup section.

trans-unit.source: Choose the label to show under each character. May have a minor effect on scrolling performance.
trans-unit.target: Choose the label to show under each character. May have a minor effect on scrolling performance.

trans-unit.source: Enables transparency effects in the UI. If transparency in disabled in Windows settings, this will have no effect. May have a minor effect on performance on older or weaker devices.
trans-unit.target: Enables transparency effects in the UI. If transparency in disabled in Windows settings, this will have no effect. May have a minor effect on performance on older or weaker devices.

trans-unit.source: Something went wrong and we couldn't start the app right now. Please consider posting details about this error to GitHub so we can help you fix it.
trans-unit.target: Something went wrong and we couldn't start the app right now. Please consider posting details about this error to GitHub so we can help you fix it.
